page.title: 06 Holiday Makers
page.content: We decided to find out what sort of people come on holiday to Weston-super -Mare.We went down to the sea front and asked ten people who were on holiday to answer our questions. We found that people come to Weston from all over Britain. Three people came from{Birmingham.}The rest came from{Wales, London, Halifax, Stow, {Coventry and Woking in Surrey.}People probably come here from Birmingham because it is the nearest sea-side town and they can use the{M5. Most people travelled by car although some came by train or coach. People seem to stay for either one or two weeks. While people are staying here they visit many of the tourist attractions. They visit the piers, parks, Breandown and the museum. Although Weston is a sea-side resort
